```{r}
## Function 8. Short term taphonomic loss
short_loss <- function(x, theta_s){
  res <- c()
  for (i in 1:length(x)){
    res[i] <- rbinom(1, x[i], theta_s)
  }
  return(res)
}

## Function 9. Long term taphonomic loss
long_loss <- function(x, theta_l, it){
  t <- it+1950
  for (i in 1:ncol(x)){
    prob <- theta_l^(t-i)
    s <- x[, i]
    for (k in 1:length(s)){
      s[k] <- rbinom(1, s[k], prob)
      
    }
    x[, i] <- s  
  }
  return(x)
}
```
